text: Finland competed at the 2018 Winter Paralympics in PyeongChang, South Korea, from 9 to 18 March 2018. == Medalists == Finnish Paralympic Committee has announced a medal target of 3 medals, which Finland managed to win. |align="left" valign="top"| {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font- size:95%" |- !
